summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing a University District Parking and Business Improvement Area; providing for the levy of special assessments upon business within the area, the deposit of revenues in a special account and expenditures therefrom; providing for an implementing agreement and making a conditionally reimbursable appropriation from the General Fund therefor; all by a three-fourth vote of the City Council.
note: This Council Bill was replaced by [Ordinance 118412](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=&s4=118412&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=1&f=G), passed by the Full Council on November 25, 1996.
